safetyTips: Social distancing, knocking and leaving on doorstep, contact-free.
name: Niangs Thai
description: Fresh Thai meals delivered to your doorstep. Delivering to all SE postcodes. Made using recipes passed down through generations, along with the freshest locally-sourced organic and free-range ingredients, and paired with authentic flavours. All curries are dairy-, gluten-, MSG- and wheat-free. Pre-order online for fortnightly Friday delivery. Monthly dates listed on our website.
